CommonIntake.prompt: Can you describe your symptoms in your own words?
CommonIntake.prompt_my: Boleh terangkan simptom anda dengan perkataan anda sendiri?

CommonIntake.prompt: Please type patient’s name (as in IC)
CommonIntake.prompt_my: Sila taip nama pesakit (seperti dalam IC)

CommonIntake.prompt: Is the patient pregnant or breastfeeding?
What are your symptoms? (Select one or more)
CommonIntake.prompt_my: Apakah simptom anda? (Pilih satu atau lebih)

CommonIntake.prompt: How long do the symptoms persist?
What is your body temperature? (degrees Celsius)
Do you have allergies to any medication?
CommonIntake.prompt_my: Adakah anda alah kepada sebarang ubat?

CommonIntake.prompt: Did you take any medication recently?
CommonIntake.prompt_my: Adakah anda mengambil sebarang ubat baru-baru ini?

Flu.prompt: Do you experience flu symptoms before?
Flu.prompt_my: Adakah anda pernah mengalami simptom selesema sebelum ini?

Flu.prompt: ANS for less than 1–2 days persistence
Flu.prompt_my: ANS untuk kegigihan kurang dari 1–2 hari
details: Hurix's 600 Fluaway capsule improved: 3 tablets 4 times per day.
If your condition becomes serious or does not improve, please refer to a doctor.

Fever.prompt: Do you experience fever symptoms before?
Fever.prompt_my: Adakah anda pernah mengalami simptom demam sebelum ini?

Fever.prompt: ANS for less than 1–2 days persistence
Fever.prompt_my: ANS untuk kegigihan kurang dari 1–2 hari
details: Paracetamol (Panadol) 500mg: 2 tablets three times a day, max 8 tablets per day.
If your condition becomes serious or does not improve, please refer to a doctor.

Cough.prompt: Do you experience this cough before?
Cough.prompt_my: Adakah anda pernah mengalami batuk ini sebelum ini?

Cough.prompt: ANS for less than 1–2 days persistence
Cough.prompt_my: ANS untuk kegigihan kurang dari 1–2 hari
details: If your condition becomes serious or does not improve, please refer to a doctor.

Diarrhoe.prompt_my: Adakah anda pernah mengalami cirit-birit sebelum ini?

Diarrhoe.prompt: ANS for less than 1–2 days persistence
Diarrhoe.prompt_my: ANS untuk kegigihan kurang dari 1–2 hari
details: If your condition becomes serious or does not improve, please refer to a doctor.

Constipation.prompt_my: Adakah anda pernah mengalami sembelit sebelum ini?

Constipation.prompt: ANS for less than 1–2 days persistence
Constipation.prompt_my: ANS untuk kegigihan kurang dari 1–2 hari
details: If your condition becomes serious or does not improve, please refer to a doctor.

AppFlow.prompt: Do you want to purchase this medication?
AppFlow.prompt_my: Adakah anda mahu membeli ubat ini?
